snippet: Georgetown goalkeeper Tomas Gomez blocked Helge Leikvang’s shot in the final round of a shootout, lifting the Hoyas over Maryland on penalty kicks in the N.C.A.A. soccer semifinals.
abstract: Georgetown defeats Maryland, 4-3, on penalty kicks after a 4-4 tie in NCAA soccer semifinals in Hoover, Ala.
lead_paragraph: Georgetown goalkeeper Tomas Gomez blocked Helge Leikvang’s shot in the final round of a shootout, lifting the Hoyas over Maryland on penalty kicks in the N.C.A.A. soccer semifinals.

headline.main: Georgetown Advances to N.C.A.A. Soccer Final
